description: Reduce the number of orders to deliver per day through delivery date app and set cut-off time to place orders for the same day delivery.

title: Quick & easy setup
description: Very easy to understand and simple in installation, just a few moments away for taking an awesome reviews from customers.

title: Improve your store function
description: Meta fields have four components: namespace, key, value, and description (optional).

title: Instant Product Preview
description: Shopper will be able to view product details quickly with less clicks.

title: Add unlimited custom option
description: The meta fields object allows you to store additional information for products, collections, customers, orders, blogs, pages and your shop.

title: Increase Sales
description: A customer can add more items to their cart from quick view popup, which turns to reduced shopping time & increase sales.

title: Fast checkout for Add to Cart
description: Show Cart items in a popup or direct your customers to checkout as they click the Add to Cart button.

title: Buy Now + Add to Cart checkout
description: Boost your checkouts! Combine the Add Buy Now button with the Add to Cart button.

title: Guide customers to checkout
description: Replace regular Ñart page with a popup cart to improve user conversions.

title: Hit Counter for Social Proof
description: Visitor counter shows how many visitors have come to your site. Provide social proof for new visitors instantly!

title: Configure Your Visitor Counter
description: Choose whether you want to track unique or all site visits. Add a visitors counter to every page or a specific product page!

title: Custom Visitor Count
description: Customize your hit counter with custom animations, fonts, backgrounds, borders and more!

title: Infinite Product Options
description: Unlimited custom options as buttons, colour swatches, image swatches, and more. Personalize with custom text boxes, & image/ file uploads.

title: Customizable product options
description: Customize your buttons, color swatches, & image swatches. Use our settings or add code to customize even further. Product Personalizer

title: Price Add-ons
description: Easily add extra prices to all your product options. Add charges for any upgrades, add-ons, or additional services.  Perfect for Clothing.

title: Make your products findable
description: Categorise to make your products easier to find (search for) and discover (stumble across)

title: Categories at mulitple levels
description: Publish categories and nested sub-categories for search engines to target your SEO

title: Add Get a Quote (POA) button

title: Customisable quote form

title: Unlimited Product Options
description: Arrange your products by unlimited number of product options including checkbox, radio button, textbox, image upload, image upload and more

description: Customer feedbacks can help you to increase the sales of your products and achieve higher customer satisfaction.

description: Build up your own form or use pre-built templates. Use it for product reviews, store feedback, contact form or any kind of forms you want.

description: Choose between a variety of swatch themes.
